messages.subject: foxglove
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/7/03 8:08:25 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/7/03 8:08:25 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< He's the
real McCoy, he's been there and done that. Most of the posters on the list
are in the midst of unschooling, and might have benefited from his
experience. Too bad, we'll never know... >>

Actually, many of us do know. We've read Neds posts about his son over two
years ago at the message board, we've met him in real life and discussed many
things with him. Several of the people here were on a discussion panel with
him, while others of us were in the audience.
If he would have stuck to his unschooling experience no one would have ever
complained, we LOVED those posts.
You weren't here, so what is your purpose in trying to stir things up that
happened before you were here?
I've met Ned and enjoyed what he had to say, have you met him?
I enjoy learning from his unschooling wisdom, if only he'd preached that I
never would have tired of his posts.
Ned is welcome to come back here anytime he wants, so how is he banned?
Are you reading any of the responses you've been given?
Why oh why are you continuing to harp on this topic when everyone (including
the list owner) has answered your questions and tried to move ON!!??

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
